writer.name: 提图斯·波波维奇 Titus Popovici

director.name: 米尔恰·穆莱桑 Mircea Muresan

introduction: Nea Costel and his consort, Dido, will at all costs their daughter, Tina, participate in beauty contest Miss Litoral, announced in Mamaia. But Tina is in love with Dorel, a shy boy and jealous Tina sees no beauty like those that appear on magazine covers and want to keep it for himself.So Tina bent heart leave the contest, sent especially maternal ambition. On the coast are expected Mielu godfather, long-haul captain. He and Uncle Costel tried all sorts of tricks to attract the attention of the jury president and his wife, a former Miss.Comic adventures of the couple formed by Costel uncle and godfather Mielu us into the waters of the Black Sea in Crimea, Yalta ... Besides the two, a former comrade meet again became prince who wants to impose his daughter at all costs and with a doctor specialist in facial surgery ... But Dorel gives the following alerts Tina and her mother arriving dash beachfront triggering a series of trouble.The contest takes place and Tina completely transformed, becoming Miss Litoral. But, of course, with all the temptations that confronts a Miss, she loves all Dorel.
